snippet.title: Love Amidst the Timeless Rift - Trailer (Short Version) (FREE Boys' Love/Yaoi VN)
snippet.description:
'Love Amidst the Timeless Rift' is fully released and free to play!

Download it Here: tinyurl.com/b9w6pa7b 

If you adore a delightful blend of cute fantasy romance, comedy, and heartfelt moments, immerse yourself in the enchanting world of 'Love Amidst the Timeless Rift' at its full glory!

ꕥ Synopsis 
Time has frozen for everyone except our hero and his fellow guild members.

Turns out, our villain is kidnapping and brainwashing an army of people for his grand castle renovation.

Yet, the key to saving everyone lies in...

ENTERTAINING HIM AND CONFESSING YOUR SECRETS?!?! WITH YOUR GUIlD MEMBERS?!?!

ꕥ Credits 
TsunamiJuria - Video Editor
